N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 431.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of subdivisions (6) through (10) of section
134
of the Workers' Compensation Law is to create a Safety Incentive Program under
which qualified employers who implement a safety incentive plan as recommended
by a certified safety and loss management specialist will be eligible for a
credit against their workers' compensation insurance premiums or, where
applicable, a reduction in their self-insurance security deposit. The purpose
of subdivision (9) of section
134
of the Workers' Compensation Law and this Part is to implement an audit and
review process under which the board can monitor all such safety incentive
plans implemented by employers. Notes
